[[inst_hl_lhi_pr]]
==== HL.LHI.PR

*Syntax:* hl.lhi.pr [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhi_pr.svg[HL.LHI.PR encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA/PRE_INDEX

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)
